title: disclaimer & about/contact
content:
The content on midasmill.com is provided for informational and educational purposes only and does not constitute financial, investment, legal, or professional advice.

Any references to investing, trading, cryptocurrencies, or business strategies are not recommendations. You are responsible for your own decisions and should conduct independent research or consult a qualified professional.

Midas Mill makes no guarantees regarding outcomes and is not liable for any losses or damages arising from the use of this website.

â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”

Midas Mill is a collective of builders and technologists focused on the practical application of AI, crypto, automation, and no-code systems.

We specialize in translating complex and rapidly evolving tools into clear, structured frameworks intended for learning and experimentation. Our work emphasizes execution, testing, and systems thinking over theory.
Midas Mill operates with discretion and does not promote individual identities. The content shared reflects general principles and examples derived from internal research and applied use.

Our audience includes builders, creators, and entrepreneurs seeking to understand and navigate an increasingly technology-driven economy.
